What is the purpose of the `sendcurrency` command when bridging from Verus to Ethereum?
The `sendcurrency` command is used to estimate the bridging costs from Verus to Ethereum. It allows you to calculate the gas fees required to use the smart contract on the Ethereum side.

# How to bridge from Verus to Ethereum Bridge VRSC, ETH, DAI, MKR, Bridge.vETH and any other bridged assets from the Verus blockchain to the Ethereum blockchain.To bridge from Verus to Ethereum gas fees have to be paid to use the smart contract on the Ethereum side. It can be very expensive.You can estimate the bridging costs through Verus Mobile or if you are on a computer use the following command: (⚠️ KEEP THE `1` AT THE END OR YOU WILL SEND THE ACTUAL AMOUNT)``` json run sendcurrency "*" '[{   "currency":"veth",   "exportto":"veth",   "address":"0x71518580f36FeCEFfE0721F06bA4703218cD7F63",   "amount":1,   "refundto":"john doe@" }]' 1 0.0001 1 ```Or use:``` json curl --location 'https://YOUR-API-SERVER' \ --header 'content-type: text/plain;' \ --data-raw '{   "jsonrpc": "1.0",   "id": "curltext",   "method": "sendcurrency",   "params": [     "*",     [       {         "currency": "veth",         "exportto": "veth",         "address": "0x71518580f36FeCEFfE0721F06bA4703218cD7F63",         "amount": 1,         "refundto": "john doe@"       }     ],     1,     0.0001,     true   ] }' ```Then you look for the number after ``i5w5MuNik5NtLcYmNzcvaoixooEebB6MGV``, it is the fee you have to pay in VRSC to cross from Verus to Ethereum.⏱️ The bridging from Verus to Ethereum can take 30 - 60 mins.Learn how to go from Verus to Ethereum with [Verus Mobile](/eth-bridge/verus-to-ethereum.html#verus-mobile), [Verus Desktop](/eth-bridge/verus-to-ethereum.html#verus-desktop) or [CLI](/eth-bridge/verus-to-ethereum.html#cli).## Verus Mobile To bridge over from Verus to Ethereum using Verus Mobile you can go to vETH (or DAI.vETH, MKR.vETH, VRSC or other bridged assets). Then click on "Send", then "Convert or Cross-chain", then "Send off-chain".![image-verus-mobile-bridge](/images/mobile-verus-to-eth.png)**``Recipient Address``** is your Ethereum address.**``Select network to send to``** select ``vETH``Then follow the next steps.## Verus Desktop To bridge over from Verus to Ethereum using Verus Desktop you can press "Convert Currencies" and go to the "Advanced"-tab. Fill in the red highlighted inputs.![image-verus-desktop-bridge](/images/desktop-verus-to-eth.png)

How can I estimate the bridging costs from Verus to Ethereum using the command line?

You can estimate the bridging costs from Verus to Ethereum using the following command:
```
json run sendcurrency "*" '[{ "currency":"veth", "exportto":"veth", "address":"0x71518580f36FeCEFfE0721F06bA4703218cD7F63", "amount":1, "refundto":"john doe@" }]' 1 0.0001 1
```
Note that the `1` at the end of the command is important, as it specifies that you want to estimate the costs, not actually send the amount.

What information do I need to provide when using the `sendcurrency` command to estimate bridging costs?

When using the `sendcurrency` command to estimate bridging costs, you need to provide the following information:

* `currency`: The type of currency being bridged (e.g. `veth`)
* `exportto`: The destination chain (e.g. `veth`)
* `address`: The Ethereum address receiving the bridged assets
* `amount`: The amount of currency being bridged (set to `1` to estimate costs)
* `refundto`: The Verus address to refund to in case of failure

How long does the bridging process from Verus to Ethereum typically take?
The bridging process from Verus to Ethereum can take anywhere from 30 to 60 minutes.

What are the different ways to bridge from Verus to Ethereum?

There are three ways to bridge from Verus to Ethereum:

1. Using Verus Mobile
2. Using Verus Desktop
3. Using the Command Line Interface (CLI)
